entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow changing to snow in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
